item.title: All Ears November 12th
item.description: Talked with Langdon Auger about his problems staying focused in the school year. Also answered questions as per usual. Was sexy.
item.itunes:subtitle: Christmas vs. Mormei

item.title: All Ears October 29th
item.description: Spooky Edition of All Ears! Answered questions live with the Ouija Board while Mormei called in sick live from her bedroom.
item.itunes:subtitle: Don't be a Sexy Ebola Patient

item.title: All Ears October 15th
item.description: The 15th episode of All Ears celebrated by a hilarious role reversal in which the hosts switched identities and answered all the questions submitted live.
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy 15th Birthday

item.title: All Ears October 1st
item.description: Interviewed Tolstoy and Moby Dick, answer lived questions
item.itunes:subtitle: Tolstoy's Muffins

item.description: Talked with Jane Doe and Comrade about dealing with homeless people respectfully. Answered live questions with the panel.
item.itunes:subtitle: Spider-Man Wins!!!!!!!

item.title: All Ears September 3th
item.description: Answered questions, helped someone get out of a kayak, things to do and not to do on campus, sticker promotion.
item.itunes:subtitle: Let Me Whisper in Your Ear

item.title: All Ears August 20th
item.description: Guest David spoke to us about issues and misconceptions about the deaf community, answered questions, acoustic cover from Tiny Alpine Hut (Mormei Zanke)
item.itunes:subtitle: Sensual Scruff

item.title: All Ears August 6th
item.description: 10th episode celebration, answer questions, played some cool tunes, gave new school year advice.
item.itunes:subtitle: We lied...

item.description: Interview with Hairy Hanna, one in a lifetime slam poem, answered questions live!

item.description: Answered questions live, introduced self help segment, and mormei's bad jokes.
item.itunes:subtitle: Who do you call for help when parking?

item.description: Spend-thrift Sally Interview, answered questions live, course registration advice, terrible joke with Mormei!

item.description: Interview with Stressed out Sam, answered questions live and gave advice on cheap Vancouver eats.

item.description: we answer questions that we haven't had the time to answer, and give advice on things to do the Vancouver Summer.

item.description: Interview with Roaring Rory, answered live questions and gave advice on job hunting.
item.itunes:subtitle: It's a Small World

item.description: Interviewed Confused Casandra, answered live questions and campus advice with Brandon on how to stay in touch with friends over the summer.
